main event: An unidentified object was observed from the control tower at Vance AFB, Oklahoma in January 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as round, silver, and emitting bright lights that changed colors from red to orange and blue to green., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes and was confirmed by control tower personnel., Binoculars were used to observe the object, which was estimated to be at 35,000 feet., The object appeared to be hovering and rotating but also seemed to move, leading to confusion about its stationary nature., There was no definitive explanation found for the sighting, ruling out aircraft and electronic countermeasures.
sighted object: unidentified object, size of pea, round shape
witness description: Control tower operator and instructor pilot
